extendedInfo.description: Cowboy Country 1460 AMCome the noon hour, every Monday thru Friday, you are invited to take a trip with us, back thru time, back to the beginning...to 'The Way Country Was'. You'll hear songs and stories about the musicians, singers, performers, songwriters, producers and the classic music the defined the sound called 'Country Music'. Can you hear the juke box in the smoke filled halls of a Honky Tonk... the banjo mandolin rhythm's of Bluegrass...Cowboys and their lonesome songs...the women of Country....Bob Wills and his timeless Texas Swing...and the contemporary artists who carry on the tradition of the finest music ever recorded.
